verses.verse: I waited<WH6960> patiently<WH6960> for Yahweh.<WH3068> He turned<WH5186> to me,<WH8085> and heard my cry.<WH7775>

He brought me up<WH5927> also out of a horrible<WH7588> pit,<WH953> out of the miry<WH3121> clay.<WH2916> He set<WH6965> my feet<WH7272> on a rock,<WH5553> and gave me a firm place<WH3559> to stand.<WH838>

He has put<WH5414> a new<WH2319> song<WH7892> in my mouth,<WH6310> even praise<WH8416> to our God.<WH430> Many<WH7227> shall see<WH7200> it,<WH3372> and fear, and shall trust<WH982> in Yahweh.<WH3068>
Blessed<WH835> is the man<WH1397> who makes<WH7760> Yahweh<WH3068> his trust,<WH4009> and doesn't<WH6437> respect the proud,<WH7295> nor such as turn aside<WH7750> to lies.<WH3577>

Many,<WH7227> Yahweh,<WH3068> my God,<WH430> are the wonderful<WH6381> works which you have done,<WH6213> and your thoughts<WH4284> which are toward us.<WH5046> They can't be declared back to you.<WH5046> If I would declare and speak<WH1696> of them,<WH6105> they are more than can be numbered.<WH5608>
Sacrifice<WH2077> and offering<WH4503> you didn't<WH2654> desire. You have opened<WH3738> my ears.<WH241> You have not required<WH7592> burnt offering<WH5930> and sin offering.<WH2401>
Then I said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH935> I have come. It is written<WH3789> about me in the book<WH5612> in the scroll.<WH4039>
I delight<WH2654> to do<WH6213> your will,<WH7522> my God.<WH430> Yes,<WH8451> your law is within<WH8432> my heart.<WH4578>"
I have proclaimed<WH1319> glad news of righteousness<WH6664> in the great<WH7227> assembly.<WH6951> Behold,<WH3607> I will not seal my lips,<WH8193> Yahweh,<WH3068> you know.<WH3045>

I have not hidden<WH3680> your righteousness<WH6666> within<WH8432> my heart.<WH3820> I have declared<WH559> your faithfulness<WH530> and your salvation.<WH8668> I have not concealed<WH3582> your loving kindness<WH2617> and your truth<WH571> from the great<WH7227> assembly.<WH6951>
Don't<WH3607> withhold your tender mercies<WH7356> from me,<WH3068> Yahweh. Let your loving kindness<WH2617> and your truth<WH571> continually<WH8548> preserve me.<WH5341>

For innumerable<WH4557> evils<WH7451> have surrounded<WH661> me.<WH5771> My iniquities have overtaken<WH5381> me,<WH3201> so that I am not able to look up.<WH7200> They are more<WH6105> than the hairs<WH8185> of my head.<WH7218> My heart<WH3820> has failed me.<WH5800>
Be pleased,<WH7521> Yahweh,<WH3068> to deliver<WH5337> me.<WH2363> Hurry to help<WH5833> me,<WH3068> Yahweh.

Let them be disappointed<WH954> and confounded<WH2659> together<WH3162> who seek<WH1245> after my soul<WH5315> to destroy<WH5595> it.<WH5472> Let them be turned backward<WH268> and brought to dishonor<WH3637> who delight<WH2655> in my hurt.<WH7451>
Let them be desolate<WH8074> by reason<WH6118> of their shame<WH1322> that tell<WH559> me,<WH1889> "Aha! Aha!<WH1889>"
Let all those who seek<WH1245> you rejoice<WH7797> and be glad<WH8055> in you.<WH157> Let such as love your salvation<WH8668> say<WH559> continually,<WH8548> "Let Yahweh<WH3068> be exalted!<WH1431>"
But I am poor<WH6041> and needy.<WH34> May the Lord<WH136> think<WH2803> about me.<WH5833> You are my help and my deliverer.<WH6403> Don't<WH309> delay, my God.<WH430>
